sentences.en: an attempt to rationalize his violent behaviour
sentences.cn: 对他的暴力行为作出合理解释的尝试

sentences.en: Attempting to define the quality measure for a requirement helps to rationalize fuzzy requirements.
sentences.cn: 试着对需求文档建立质量标准可以帮助我们把模糊的需求更加清晰化.

sentences.en: But have always been squanderers, and there have apparently always been theorists to rationalize their squandering.
sentences.cn: 但是这个世界上总有许多挥霍成性的人, 也总有许多理论家,为挥霍行为寻找合理化的借口.

sentences.en: But ignorance cannot be used to rationalize irresponsibility.
sentences.cn: 但是不知情不能成为不负责任的理由.

sentences.en: First, let us look at how some people rationalize their thoughts.
sentences.cn: 首先, 让我们看看某些人是如何为他们的思想作出解释的.

sentences.en: He further rationalized his activity by convincing himself that he was actually promoting peace.
sentences.cn: 他通过说服自己确实是在促进和平来进一步使自己的行为合理化。

sentences.en: How do we rationalize the fear and sorrow that each one of us feels?
sentences.cn: 如果释怀我们感受到的恐惧和悲伤?

sentences.en: I can't rationalize my absurd fear of insects.
sentences.cn: 我怕昆虫，毫无道理，不能合理地解释。

sentences.en: I poured my thoughts out on paper in an attempt to rationalize my feelings.
sentences.cn: 我把自己的想法一股脑地写在纸上，以试图给自己的感受找个说辞。

sentences.en: If you rationalize your fears, you can understand them better.
sentences.cn: 如果你分析自己恐惧的成因, 你就会更清楚地了解这些恐惧.

sentences.en: It helps to rationalize logistic move and resources distribution.
sentences.cn: 配送制有益于物流运动合理化,有利于合理配置资源.

sentences.en: It's very difficult to rationalize away any unsatisfactory results.
sentences.cn: 对于不满意的结果,为其辩护是困难的.

sentences.en: One is rationalize the management system worked in State - owned enterprises.
sentences.cn: 一是理顺市属 国有 企业管理体制.

sentences.en: Our systems will be rationalized over the coming months.
sentences.cn: 在未来的几个月里，我们的体制将进行合理化改革。

sentences.en: People buy with their emotions and justify and rationalize with logic.
sentences.cn: 人们在购买时伴随着情绪以及正确、合理、合算的逻辑判断.

sentences.en: There is a human urge to clarify, rationalize, justify ( Leonard Bernstein )
sentences.cn: 有要澄清 、 阐释和辨明的人的本能冲动 ( 伦纳德伯恩斯坦 )

sentences.en: Tom's parents sometimes find it difficult to rationalize his behavior.
sentences.cn: 汤姆的父母有时候发现很难理解他的行为.
